Due to some weird behaviour with itch.io's local storage, saved data will not persist after the browser is closed. For that reason, you should play HERE instead.

A tower defense game in which you catch and defeat pokemon. This game was originally made by SamAndDan games, but was removed since it ran on flash.

You may need to zoom out to 90% on certain monitors since the canvas size is not responsive.
